library.name: Lightbox2
library.author: Lokesh Dhakar
library.notes: Lightbox2 is used for creating responsive image modals in the plugin. The library is included as a minified JavaScript file at the specified location.

library.name: SSD MobileNet V1 (Shard 1)
library.author: Vincent Mühler (justadudewhohacks)
library.notes: This file is part of the SSD MobileNet V1 object detection model. Ensure that both shards (shard1 and shard2) are included for the model to function correctly.

library.name: SSD MobileNet V1 (Shard 2)
library.author: Vincent Mühler (justadudewhohacks)
library.notes: This file is part of the SSD MobileNet V1 object detection model. Ensure that both shards (shard1 and shard2) are included for the model to function correctly.
